to.sven.androidrccar.common.framework

Interface IFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFactory

    public interface IFactory
    This factory provides creators for all classes that AbstractLogic needed to create. It also contains a generic creator for IMessageHandlers.
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ILocationService createLocationService(Context context)
      Creates a new instance of LocationService.

    • Method Detail

      • createMessageHandler

        <THandler extends IMessageHandler<?>> THandler createMessageHandler(java.lang.Class<THandler> type,
                                                                  ILogicHandlerFacade<?> logic)
                                                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates an instance of the the given Class. The given Class needs to haven an constructor, where the given logic can passed.
        Type Parameters:
        THandler - An concrete IMessageHandler that should created.
        Parameters:
        type - The Class of the IMessageHandler
        logic - The logic that passed to the constructor of the IMessageHandler
        Returns:
        The created instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the instantiation failed.

      • createRemoteCommuncation

        IRemoteCommunication createRemoteCommuncation(IDependencyContainer<?,?> dependencyContainer,
                                            IRemoteCommunicationListener cpListener)
        Creates a new instance of RemoteCommunication.
        Parameters:
        dependencyContainer - Needed to get the Socket and the Handler.
        cpListener - IRemoteCommunicationListener
        Returns:
        Created instance as IRemoteCommunication.

      • createLocationService

        ILocationService createLocationService(Context context)
        Creates a new instance of LocationService.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the application.
        Returns:
        Created instance as ILocationService
